_header: Dread God and flee from sin
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler TM 369; see also 1204.
_description: Proverbs copied from inscriptions on the ceiling of the library at Leconfield — twenty-three quatrains

BLRoy18Dii.First Lines: DRede god and fle from syn.Of hym all goodnes dothe begyn.…
BLRoy18Dii.Last Lines: …That at the last thowshalt dye.Love well & fere not hardely.
BLRoy18Dii.Attributed Title:
The prouerbes in the roufe of my lordis library at lekyngefeld (f.
                        204v)
